backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor and all content-related types for videos, series, episodes, live channels, ads, brands, and analytics.
backend/migration.mo: Provides old/new type definitions and migration logic for upgrading content structures, including expanded ContentType variants.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global providers, and ties all pages into the app’s navigation structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsD: Displays analytics stats and trending content fetched from useGetAnalytics, with loading skeletons and cards for views, users, impressions, and revenue.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandManag: Provides UI to create, update, delete brands and assign films, series, clips, or live channels using various query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChannelMan: Creates, edits, and deletes live channels with name, logo upload, and original-status flags using live channel query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClipsManag: Manages clip creation, editing, and deletion with video and thumbnail uploads, metadata fields, and premium/original flags.
frontend/src/components/admin/LiveSchedu: Manages adding and removing scheduled programs for live channels by selecting videos and updating channel schedules.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManualAdsM: UI and logic for uploading ad media, creating ad assignments, and deleting existing ads using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/MoviesMana: Manages movie uploads and edits, handling video files, thumbnails, metadata, and CRUD operations through query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/PodcastsMa: Handles podcast upload and editing with video and thumbnail files, metadata fields, and update/delete actions via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeriesMana: Provides creation and management of TV series, seasons, and episodes with file uploads and metadata editing.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripeSetu: Sets up or updates Stripe configuration by submitting API keys and allowed countries, showing current config state.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoManag: Admin UI for uploading, editing, and deleting videos with file handling, form state, and backend mutations.
Reusable modal component supporting multiple icon types, actions, and stylized dialog layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding and interactive links that open a contextual modal with preset info content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, search, user actions, and responsive mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a large hero banner with autoplaying video preview, branding, and buttons to play or view more info.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the app layout structure with header, footer, routed content, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal prompting Internet Identity users to enter an email and saves the updated profile.
frontend/src/components/SeriesCard.tsx: Clickable card showing a series thumbnail, metadata, and navigation to the series detail page.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video content card with thumbnail, metadata, premium/original badges, and navigation to the watch page.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Custom video player supporting ads, autoplay previews, quality controls, and user interaction handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Provides authentication context supporting email/password and Internet Identity, including session restore logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating videos, user profiles, admin checks, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, gradients, animations, and scrollbar customization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only panel that loads admin status and displays tabbed management sections for videos, clips, series, channels, live TV, brands, ads, and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Fetches brand details and associated content, then displays films, series, and clips for a selected brand with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/ClipsPage.tsx: Lists all clips with thumbnails and navigation to the watch page, showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/EpisodePlayerPage.tsx: Loads a specific series episode, checks access rules, and plays the episode with ads depending on user status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds a featured slideshow from videos, series, and ads, and displays general content sections once data loads.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Provides live TV playback by selecting channels and computing the current program loop, inserting ads for non‑premium users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login and registration UI with form validation, redirects, and authentication handlers.
frontend/src/pages/MoviesPage.tsx: Fetches all videos, filters movies, and displays them with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/NetworksPage.tsx: Loads and displays network brands as clickable cards with skeletons for loading.
frontend/src/pages/OriginalsPage.tsx: Displays original videos and series with category tabs and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with navigation options to retry or go home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe session status, updates profile, and shows success UI with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile, premium/admin status, and watch history after authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Searches content by query, fetches results, and displays categorized cards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SeriesDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed series info including seasons, episodes, and metadata with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TVShowsPage.tsx: Loads all TV series and displays them in a grid with a loading skeleton and empty-state fallback.
frontend/src/pages/UpgradePage.tsx: Handles premium upgrade flow using Stripe, redirects admins, and shows feature list with checkout handling.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Displays video playback with ads based on user premium status and handles loading, not-found, and access states.
frontend/src/utils/contentType.ts: Utility functions for mapping and checking content types such as movies, films, podcasts, and series.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing a video platform, outlining issues in autoplay/UI/admin flows and listing feature requirements for video playback and content‑type handling.
